column4: my end of life Ubuntu 7.1 can't be upgraded?  it says up-to-date in update manager
7.10 recently went out of support (EOL), you'll have to do a few extra steps to get to 8.04
etherealite: change the owner to www-data:www-data, not username:username
etherealite: good point for me I"m the only one.  and if someone breaks in as they have they can't break it.
